Contradict fact: The claim that non-resident Indians can vote online in general elections contradicts the fact that India does not allow online voting for any eligible voters.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or official information provided to back up the claim.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that non-resident Indians can vote online in general elections without providing any evidence or official confirmation.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that non-resident Indians cannot vote online and must physically go to their designated polling station with their passport to cast their vote.
